meta.title: Find Your Perfect Coaching Package
meta.description: Take our 2-minute quiz to discover which coaching program aligns with your journey.

intro.headline: Discover Your Path Forward
intro.subheadline: Answer 6 quick questions to find the coaching package that's right for you.
intro.privacy: Your answers are confidential and help us serve you better.

questions.lifeStage: What best describes your current life stage?
questions.challenge: What's your biggest challenge right now?
questions.goals: What do you most hope to achieve through coaching?
questions.commitment: How ready are you to invest in your growth?
questions.faithImportance: How important is faith in your growth journey?
questions.urgency: What's driving your decision to seek coaching now?

commitment.readyInvest: Ready to invest in meaningful change

faithImportance.open: Open to it — curious to explore

urgency.crisis: I'm in crisis and need support now

email.headline: Almost There!
email.subheadline: Enter your details to receive your personalized results and a downloadable growth roadmap.
email.privacy: We respect your privacy. Unsubscribe anytime.

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address

results.headline: Your Personalized Recommendation
results.basedOnAnswers: Based on your answers, we recommend:

discovery: Explore if coaching is right for you

discovery.stressOverwhelm: It sounds like you're carrying a heavy load right now. A Discovery Session will help you identify what's truly driving your stress and create a faith-centered plan to find peace.
discovery.relationships: Relationship challenges can feel isolating. Let's explore what's happening and discover practical, faith-aligned steps toward healthier connections.
discovery.careerPurpose: Feeling uncertain about your direction is more common than you think. A Discovery Session will help you clarify your calling and explore your options.
discovery.parenting: Parenting is one of life's greatest challenges. Let's talk about what you're experiencing and find tools that align with your values.
discovery.faithSpiritual: Questions about faith often arise during life's transitions. A Discovery Session provides space to explore these questions with guidance and compassion.
discovery.lifeTransition: Transitions can be disorienting, but they're also opportunities for growth. Let's discover what this new chapter might hold for you.
discovery.general: A Discovery Session is the perfect starting point to explore your goals and see if coaching is right for you.

clarity.stressOverwhelm: Four weeks of focused support can help you build sustainable stress management practices rooted in faith and practical action.
clarity.relationships: The Clarity Package will help you identify relationship patterns and develop healthier communication strategies over 4 focused weeks.
clarity.careerPurpose: This package is designed to help you gain clarity on your career path and purpose through guided reflection and action planning.
clarity.parenting: Four weeks of dedicated parenting support will equip you with practical tools and renewed confidence.
clarity.faithSpiritual: The Clarity Package will help you reconnect with your faith and find direction in just 4 weeks.
clarity.lifeTransition: Navigating a transition requires focused support. This 4-week program will help you move forward with clarity and confidence.
clarity.general: The Clarity Package provides focused support to help you gain direction and momentum in your life.

rooted.stressOverwhelm: Your answers show you're ready for deeper change. The Rooted & Renewed program will help you transform your relationship with stress and build lasting peace.
rooted.relationships: Eight weeks of deep work will help you understand relationship patterns at their root and create lasting change in how you connect with others.
rooted.careerPurpose: This program will help you not just find direction, but truly align your life with your purpose and values.
rooted.parenting: The Rooted & Renewed program provides the depth needed to transform your parenting approach and family dynamics.
rooted.faithSpiritual: Eight weeks together will help you build a strong foundation of faith practices that will sustain you for years to come.
rooted.lifeTransition: This program provides the depth of support needed to not just navigate your transition, but to emerge transformed.
rooted.general: The Rooted & Renewed program offers the depth and time needed for meaningful, lasting transformation.

flourish.stressOverwhelm: Your commitment to change is clear. The Flourish Forward program will provide comprehensive support for complete life transformation.
flourish.relationships: Twelve weeks of comprehensive coaching will transform not just individual relationships, but how you show up in all your connections.
flourish.careerPurpose: The Flourish Forward program offers the time and depth for true vocational discernment and life alignment.
flourish.parenting: This comprehensive program will transform your entire family system, creating harmony that lasts.
flourish.faithSpiritual: Twelve weeks of deep spiritual coaching will help you flourish in faith and every area of your life.
flourish.lifeTransition: The Flourish Forward program provides complete support for total life transformation during this pivotal time.
flourish.general: The Flourish Forward program is our most comprehensive offering, designed for those ready for complete transformation.

family.stressOverwhelm: Family stress affects everyone in the household. Family coaching will help your whole family develop healthier patterns together.
family.relationships: Family dynamics are complex. Our family coaching approach addresses relationship challenges at their source — within the family system.
family.careerPurpose: Even career questions affect family life. Family coaching can help align everyone as you navigate this transition.
family.parenting: Our Family & Parent Coaching is specifically designed for the challenges you're facing. We'll work together to create harmony in your home.
family.faithSpiritual: Building a faith-centered family takes intentional work. Family coaching will help you nurture your family's spiritual growth together.
family.lifeTransition: Transitions affect the whole family. Family coaching ensures everyone navigates the change together with support.
family.general: Family & Parent Coaching provides flexible, targeted support for your family's unique needs.

cta.headline: Not Sure Where to Start?
cta.description: Take our quick assessment to discover which coaching package aligns with your journey and goals.
